frame.name: Control
frame.definition:
<def-root>A <fen>Controlling_entity</fen>, <fen>Controlling_situation</fen>, or <fen>Controlling_variable</fen> control a <fen>Dependent_entity</fen>, <fen>Dependent_situation</fen>, or <fen>Dependent_variable</fen>. The latter, dependent, element or some aspect of it is not just influenced, but determined by the controlling element.
<ex>Can <fex name="cone">you</fex> <t>control</t> <fex name="depe">the robot</fex>?</ex> <ex>Although <fex name="cone">you</fex> may not be able to <t>control</t> <fex name="deps">every situation</fex>, you can control your reaction.</ex> <ex><fex name="cone">Students</fex> do not <m>have</m> <t>control</t> <fex name="depv">over the temperature of the heating water</fex>.</ex> <ex>Everyone knows that <fex name="conv">the price of oil</fex> <t>controls</t> <fex name="depv">the price of asphalt</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Controlling_entity
FE.definition: <def-root>A thing or person whose behavior controls a <fen>Dependent_situation</fen>, <fen>Dependent_variable</fen>, or <fen>Dependent_entity</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Dependent_entity
FE.definition: <def-root>An entity, usually a thing, that is influenced in its behavior by an Controlling_entity or an Controlling_situation.</def-root>

FE.name: Controlling_variable
FE.definition: <def-root>A scalar variable (with unspecified value) which has an effect on the Dependent_entity, Dependent_variable, or Dependent_situation.</def-root>

FE.name: Dependent_situation
FE.definition: <def-root>A situation that whose temporal or other characteristics are influenced by an Controlling_entity, Controlling_event, or Controlling_variable.</def-root>

FE.name: Dependent_variable
FE.definition:
<def-root>A scalar variable, whose value depends on the behavior of an Influencing_entity, a Influencing_variable, or an Influencing_situation.
<ex>Move the slider on the SpeedBar while playing audio or video material to <t>control</t> <fex name="depv">playback speed</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Degree
FE.definition:
<def-root>The Degree to which the <fen>Influencing_entity</fen> effects the <fen>Dependent_entity</fen>.
</def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition: <def-root>The time at which the controlling occurs.</def-root>

FE.name: Place
FE.definition: <def-root>The location at which the controlling occurs.</def-root>

FE.name: Manner
FE.definition: <def-root>Any description of the event which is not covered by more specific FEs, including force (hard, softly), secondary effects (quietly, loudly), and general descriptions comparing events (the same way). It may also indicate salient characteristics of an <fen>Influencing_entity</fen> that also affect the action (presumptuously, coldly, deliberately, eagerly, carefully). </def-root>

lexUnit.name: control.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: to (primarily) determine various features of some situation or entity.

lexUnit.name: determine.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: cause to occur in a particular way; be the decisive factor in.
